channel.title: Player Name Limit
channel.description:
Use this method to limit player names to 12 chars with a minimum of 2 chars: [code]public void name() { // declaration of name() method String[] name = new String[playerName.size]; // creates an array for elements of the String playerName playerName.toArray(name); // takes String playerName and changes it into the array, name for(int i = 0; i < name.length; i++) { // loops through the name array to get all the elements if(name[i] > 12 || name[i] < 2) { // checks if there is more than 12 or less than 2 elements return; // if so, then don't accept the connection } } }[/code]
In the run() method in the client class, use this invokation: [code]name();[/code]
